# GSBM

<!-- badges: start -->
![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/GrossSBM/GSBM/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg?branch=master)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of GSBM is to regroup into a unique framework tools for estimating and manipulating variants of the stochastic blockmodel.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("GrossSBM/GSBM")
```
